divs: sighting detailsi stepped out my front door to check on some food i was cooking on the bar-b-q and as i looked up at the sky i saw a bright starlike object approaching from the south\west. it was flying at an altitude that most of the propeller planes fly at but was moving quite rapidly. as it got closer i noticed 6 green lights, two on either side and two on what seemed like a tail but the odd thing was that all of the lights including the bright front light were all pulsing at the same time. as it passed overhead i was waiting for the rumble of a jet engine or the sound of a propeller buzzing in the air but it didnt make a sound i knew right then what i had just witnessed. this is the 2nd ufo i have seen
trends: There has been one other sighting in Port Hueneme
There were no other sightings in Port Hueneme on or around January 3rd 2010
